name: Aira Come Home Chapter 1
description:
(This visual novel is a PARODY, and not affiliated with Happy Elements Ltd., nor does it intend to infringe, substitute, or replace Ensemble Stars!! nor any of its affiliate games. Credits for all contributors to this game can be found here, or in the credits in-game.)
* Chapter 1 was originally finished and uploaded on December 22, 2021.

--

Welcome to Enstarrie High School!

After seeing a show the previous year, you've finally been admitted into the high school of your dreams! However, things quickly turn in a strange direction when you see Aira Shiratori being harassed by a group of bullies. How will your first day go? Will you get along with Aira? What other secrets about him, his friends, and his enemies will reveal themselves? Find out for yourself!

--

This game was created by CL0CKWORKPUPPET, completely written and planned out during a time at which he knew nothing about Ensemble Stars!!. This game was created with the first impressions he assumed of Ensemble Stars!! based on various images, characters, and out-of-context moments. If the characters seem completely inaccurate to canon, good. That's the idea.

(At this time, Aira Come Home is not available for mobile download.)
